src_original: [CHAPTER V. YĀNĀNUTTARYAPARICCHEDA]  [1. Trividhānuttarya]  yānānuttaryam idānīṃ vaktavyaṃ / tad ucyate /  ānuttaryaṃ prapattau hi punar ālambane mataṃ /
tgt_original: 總由三無上，　　說為無上乘，

src_original: samudāgama uddiṣṭaṃ /  trividham ānuttaryaṃ mahāyāne yenaitad anuttaraṃ yānaṃ pratipattyānuttaryaṃ /  samudāgamānuttaryañ ca /  tatra pratipattyānuttaryaṃ daśapāramitāpratipattito veditavyaṃ /  pratipattis tu ṣaḍvidhā // V.1
tgt_original: 謂正行、所緣，　　及修證無上。

src_original: tāsu pāramitāsu /  paramātha manaskāre anudharme 'ntavarjane /  viśiṣṭā cāviśiṣṭā ca /  ity eṣā ṣaḍvidhā pratipattir yad uta paramā pratipattiḥ /  manaskārapratipattir anudharmapratipattiḥ /
tgt_original: 正行有六種，　　謂最勝、作意、

src_original: antadvayavarjitā pratipattiḥ viśistā pratipattiḥ /  aviśiṣṭā ca pratipattiḥ /
tgt_original: 隨法、離二邊、　　差別、無差別。

src_original: tatra /  (Mvbh 61)  paramā dvādaśātmikā // V.2
tgt_original: 最勝有十二，　　謂廣大、長時、

src_original: audāryam āyatatvaṃ ca adhikāro 'kṣayātmatā /  nairantaryam akṛcchratvaṃ vittatvaṃ ca parigrahaḥ // V.3  ārambhaprāptiniṣyandaniṣpattiḥ paramā matā /
tgt_original: 依處及無盡、　　無間、無難性、

src_original: anugraho 'vighātaś ca karma tasya ca marṣaṇaṃ /  guṇavṛddhiś ca sāmarthyam avatāravimocane /
tgt_original: 饒益、不害、受、　　增德、能入、脫、

src_original: akṣayatvaṃ sadā vṛttir niyataṃ bhogapācane // V.6  ity etad āsāṃ karma yathākramaṃ /  dānena hi bodhisatvaḥ satvān anugṛhṇāti /  śīlenopaghātaṃ pareṣāṃ na karoti /  kṣāntyā paraiḥ kṛtam upaghātaṃ marṣayati /
tgt_original: 無盡、常起、定、　　受用成熟他。

src_original: satvāṃś ca paripācayati /  uktā paramā pratipattiḥ /  [b. Manasikārapratipatti]  manasikārapratipattiḥ katamā /  yathāprajñaptito dharmamahāyānamanaskriyā /
tgt_original: 如所施設法，　　名作意正行。

src_original: saṃyuktā dharmacaritaiḥ sā jñeyā daśabhiḥ punaḥ // V.8
tgt_original: 此助伴應知，　　即十種法行。

src_original: udgrahaṇaṃ /  parebhyo deśanaṃ granthasyārthasya vā svādhyāyanaṃ /  cintanaṃ bhāvanañ ca /
tgt_original: 受持、正開演、　　諷誦及思、修。

src_original: ameyapuṇyaskandhaṃ hi caritan tad daśātmakaṃ /
tgt_original: 行十法行者，　　獲福聚無量。

src_original: (Mvbh 64)  kasmān mahāyāna eva dharmacaritam atyarthaṃ mahāphalan deśyate sūtreṣu na punaḥ śrāvakayāne /  dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ /  viśeṣād akṣayatvāc ca /  kathaṃ viśeṣāt /  katham akṣayatvāt /  parānugrahavṛttitvād viśiṣṭatvaṃ /
tgt_original: 勝故、無盡故，　　由攝他不息。

src_original: paramārthe svalakṣaṇe // V.18  saṃvṛtyā tu nedaṃ nāmamātram iti gṛhyate /  dharmadhātuvinirmukto yasmād dharmo na vidyate /  sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tasmāt sa ca tatrāviparyayaḥ // V.19
tgt_original: 於自相無倒，　　知一切唯名， 離一切分別，　　依勝義自相。

src_original: na hi dharmanairātmyena vinā kaścid dharmo vidyate /
tgt_original: 以離真法界，　　無別有一法，

src_original: yad evaṃjñānam ayaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇe 'viparyāsaḥ /
tgt_original: 故通達此者，　　於共相無倒。

src_original: viparyastamanaskārāvihāniparihāṇitaḥ /
tgt_original: 知顛倒作意，　　未滅及已滅，

src_original: tadaśuddhir viśuddhiś ca sa ca tatrāviparyayaḥ // V.20  viparyastasmanaskārāprahāṇan tasya dharmadhātor aviśuddhis tatprahāṇaṃ viśuddhir iti yad evaṃjñānam ayam aviśuddhau viśuddhau cāviparyāso yathākramaṃ  dharmadhātor viśuddhatvāt prakṛtyā vyomavat punaḥ /  dvayasyāgantukatvaṃ hi sa ca tatrāviparyayaḥ // V.21
tgt_original: 於法界雜染，　　清淨無顛倒。

src_original: dharmadhātoḥ punar ākāśavat /
tgt_original: 知法界本性，　　清淨如虛空，

src_original: mūlalakṣaṇatatvaṃ aviparyāsalakṣaṇaṃ /  phalahetumayan tatvaṃ sūkṣmaudārikam eva ca // III. 1  prasiddhaṃ śuddhiviṣayaṃ saṃgrāhyaṃ bhedalakṣaṇaṃ /  ity etad daśavidhaṃ tatvaṃ yad uta mūlatatvaṃ lakṣaṇatatvaṃ /
tgt_original: 真實唯有十，　　謂根本與相、

src_original: aviparyāsatatvaṃ /  phalahetutatvaṃ /  audārikasūkṣmatatvaṃ /  prasiddhatatvaṃ /
tgt_original: 無顛倒、因果，　　及麁細真實、

src_original: viśuddhigocaratatvaṃ /  saṃgrahatatvaṃ] prabhedatatvaṃ /
tgt_original: 極成、淨所行、　　攝受并差別，

src_original: kauśalyatatvañ ca /  tat punar daśavidhaṃ daśavidhātmagrāhapratipakṣeṇa veditavyaṃ /  tad yathā skandhakauśalyaṃ /  dhātukauśalyam āyatanakauśalyaṃ /  pratītyasamutpādakauśalyaṃ /
tgt_original: 十善巧真實，　　皆為除我見。

src_original: samāropāpavādasya dharmapudgalayor iha /  grāhyagrāhakayoś cāpi bhāvābhāve ca darśanaṃ // III.4  pudgaladharmayoḥ samāropāpavādadarśanaṃ yasya jñānān na pravartate /  tat parikalpitasvabhāve tatvalakṣaṇaṃ /  grāhyagrāhakayoḥ samāropāpavādadarśanaṃ yasya jñānān na pravartate /
tgt_original: 有非有性中，　　增益損減見；

src_original: tat paratantrasvabhāve tatvalakṣaṇaṃ /  bhāvābhāvasamāropāpavādadarśanaṃ yasya jñānān na pravartate /  tat pariniṣpannasvabhāve tatvalakṣaṇaṃ /  etan mūlatatve lakṣaṇam aviparītaṃ lakṣaṇatatvam ity ucyate /  [3. Aviparyāsatattva]
tgt_original: 知此故不轉，　　是名真實相。

src_original: aviparyāsatatvaṃ nityādiviparyāsapratipakṣeṇānityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmatā mūlatatve yathākramaṃ [/  ] kathaṃ ca tatrānityatāditā veditavyā /  asadartho hy anityārtha utpādavyayalakṣaṇaḥ // III.5  samalāmalabhāvena mūlatatve yathākramaṃ /  trayo hi svabhāvā mūlatatvaṃ [/
tgt_original: 無性與生滅、　　垢淨三無常；

src_original: ] teṣu yathākramam  asadartho hy anityārtha  utpādavyayārthaḥ samalāmalatārthaś ca /  duḥkham ādānalakṣmākhyaṃ saṃbandhenāparaṃ mataṃ // III.6  mūlatatve yathākramaṃ duḥkham upādānataḥ pudgaladharmābhiniveśopādānāt /
tgt_original: 所取及事相、　　和合苦三種；

src_original: lakṣaṇatas triduḥkhatālakṣaṇatvāt /  saṃbandhataś ca duḥkhasaṃbandhāt [/  ] tatraiva mūlatatve yathākramaṃ veditavyam /  abhāvaś cāpy atadbhāvaḥ prakṛtiḥ śūnyatā matā /  parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ na kenacit prakāreṇāstīty abhāva evāsya śūnyatā paratantralakṣaṇaṃ tathā nāsti yathā parikalpyate na tu sarvathā nāstīti tasyātadbhāvaḥ (/
tgt_original: 空亦有三種，　　謂無、異、自性；

src_original: ) śūnyatā [/  ] pariniṣpannalakṣaṇaṃ śūnyatāsvabhāvam eveti prakṛtir evāsya śūnyatā /  alakṣaṇaṃ ca nairātmyaṃ tadvilakṣaṇam eva ca // III.7  svalakṣaṇañ ca nirdiṣṭaṃ /  parikalpitasya svabhāvasya lakṣaṇam eva nāstīty alakṣaṇam evāsya nairātmyaṃ [/  ] paratantrasyāsti lakṣaṇaṃ na tu yathā parikalpyata iti tadvilakṣaṇam asya lakṣaṇan nairātmyaṃ /  pariniṣpannas tu svabhāvo nairātmyam eveti prakṛtir evāsya nairātmyam iti trividhe  mūlatatve trividhānityatā paridīpitā asadarthānityatā utpādabhaṅgānityatā samalanirmalānityatā ca /
tgt_original: 無相及異相、　　自相三無我。

src_original: duḥkhasatyam ato mataṃ  trividhena samudayārthena samudayasatyaṃ [/  ] trividhaḥ samudayārthaḥ /
tgt_original: 苦三相已說，　　集亦有三種，

src_original: vāsanātha samutthānam avisaṃyoga eva ca // III.8  vāsanāsamudayaḥ parikalpitasvabhāvābhiniveśavāsanā samutthānasamudayaḥ karmakleśāḥ /  avisaṃyogasamudayaḥ /  tathatāyā āvaraṇāvisaṃyogaḥ /
tgt_original: 謂習氣、等起，　　及相未離繫。

src_original: trividhena nirodhena nirodhasatyaṃ [/  ] trividho nirodhaḥ /  svabhāvadvayanotpattir malaśāntidvayaṃ mataṃ /  svabhāvānutpattir grāhyagrāhakayor anutpattir malaśāntidvayaṃ ca pratisaṃkhyānirodhatathatākhyam ity eṣa trividho nirodho yad uta svabhāvanirodho dvayanirodhaḥ /  prakṛtinirodhaś ca /  mārgasatyaṃ trividhe mūlatatve kathaṃ vyavasthāpyate /  parijñāyāṃ prahāṇe ca prāptisākṣātkṛtāv ayaṃ [//] III.9
tgt_original: 自性、二不生、　　垢寂二三滅，

src_original: mārgasatyaṃ samākhyātaṃ /  parikalpitasya parijñāne paratantrasya parijñāne prahāṇe ca /  pariniṣpannasya parijñāne prāptisākṣātkaraṇe ca evam atra parijñāprahāṇasākṣātkriyāyāṃ mārgasatyavyavasthānam iti veditavyaṃ [/]  [5. Audārikasūkṣmatattva]  audārikasūkṣmatatvaṃ punaḥ saṃvṛtiparamārthasatyaṃ tan mūlatatve kathaṃ veditavyaṃ /  prajñaptipratipattitas
tgt_original: 遍知及永斷、　　證得三道諦。

src_original: tathodbhāvanayodāraṃ /  trividhā hi saṃvṛtiḥ prajñaptisaṃvṛtiḥ /  pratipattisaṃvṛtiḥ /  tayā saṃvṛtisatyatvaṃ mūlatatve yathākramaṃ veditavyaṃ /
tgt_original: 應知世俗諦，　　差別有三種，
